1011010111001000 1101001111101111 1 -> sum: 1000100110111000, cout: 1

0110111101000010 0101100100001110 0 -> sum: 1100100001010000, cout: 0
1010010101001111 0011010101000100 1 -> sum: 1101101010010100, cout: 0
1010110101101101 1111010010101100 0 -> sum: 1010001000011001, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
